full_text:
Sep 9, 2019
"Challenging Rewarding Boring at Times"
Current Employee - Finance Analyst in Dearborn, MI
Recommends
Positive Outlook
No opinion of CEO
I have been working at Ford Motor Company full-time for more than 5 years
Pros
Interesting work. Challenging. Great Pay. Great hours. Great work life balance. Great opportunity for growth.
Cons
Sometimes very repetitive. Sometimes very stressful and late hours.
Advice to Management
Definitely need to fix the management structure that has a too many layers where you might get stuck in a place that seems to add little value.
Helpful
